rules.why_relevant_summary: Ensures guest chatbots only access public data
rules.compact_rule: Public chatbot MAY answer questions about company basics (name, mission, offices) but MUST NOT reveal internal IDs, salaries, or sensitive project details.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Prevents unauthorized access to sensitive data
rules.compact_rule: Agent acting for Level3 MUST deny requests for salary/workload data unless explicitly authorized via Req_WhoAmI check.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Critical for audit trails and accountability
rules.compact_rule: ALL agent actions MUST emit Req_ProvideAgentResponse with Outcome and typed Links, even when denying requests.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Protects confidential employee and customer information
rules.compact_rule: Sensitive data (salaries, personal notes, system diagrams) MUST be classified per DataCategories and require Level1/Level2 roles for access.
Level2 users MAY access resources in their city/domain; Level3 users MUST prove direct involvement via ProjectID/TeamRole checks.
Public agent MUST return denied_security for queries like 'Which engineer works on SystemX?' or exact headcount.
Agent acting for non-executive SHOULD escalate destructive actions (bulk deletes, profile wipes) via Outcome=none_unsupported.
Systems MUST normalize search inputs (e.g. German 'ö'→'oe') across office locations.
